1 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
  2 //		Modification							//
  3 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
  4 
  5 /**
  6  * change global object function bar(){}.setAttr('bar').done();
  7  * 
  8  * @param {string} fnName the name of the function 
  9  */
 10 Function.prototype.setAttr	= function(fnName){
 11 	return FunctionAttr.define(this, fnName)
 12 }
 13 
 14 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 15 //		Function Attribute						//
 16 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 17 
 18 /**
 19  * @namespace
 20  */
 21 var FunctionAttr	= {};
 22 
 23 /**
 24  * Function attribute creator
 25  * 
 26  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} a FunctionAttr.Builder builder
 27 */
 28 FunctionAttr.define	= function(originalFn, fnName){
 29 	return new FunctionAttr.Builder(originalFn, fnName)
 30 }
 31 
 32 /**
 33  * Wrap a function between 2 functions
 34  * 
 35  * @param {Function} originalFn the original function
 36  * @param {Function} beforeFn the function to call *before* the original function
 37  * @param {Function} afterFn the function to call *after* the original function
 38  * @return {Function} The modified function
 39 */
 40 FunctionAttr.wrapCall	= function(originalFn, beforeFn, afterFn){
 41 	return function(){
 42 		var stopNow	= false;
 43 		// call beforeFn if needed
 44 		if( beforeFn )	stopNow = beforeFn(originalFn, arguments);
 45 		// forward the call to the original function
 46 		var result	= originalFn.apply(this, arguments);
 47 		// call afterFn if needed
 48 		if( afterFn )	afterFn(originalFn, arguments, result);
 49 		// return the result
 50 		return result;
 51 	}
 52 }
 53 
 54 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 55 //										//
 56 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 57 
 58 /**
 59  * Internal class to build the attributes on the funciton
 60  * 
 61  * @constructor
 62  * 
 63  * @param {Function} originalFn the function on which the attributes are set
 64  * @param {String}   fnName     optional name of the function - default to 'aFunction'
 65  */
 66 FunctionAttr.Builder	= function(originalFn, fnName){
 67 	this._currentFn	= originalFn;
 68 	this._fnName	= fnName	|| 'aFunction';
 69 }
 70 
 71 /**
 72  * mark the end of the attributes declaration
 73  * 
 74  * @return {Function} The actual function with the attributes
 75 */
 76 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.done	= function(){
 77 	return this._currentFn;
 78 }
 79 
 80 // export the class in node.js - if running in node.js
 81 if( typeof(window) === 'undefined' )	module.exports	= FunctionAttr;
 82 
 83 
 84 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 85 //		generic								//
 86 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 87 
 88 /**
 89  * display a message with a timestamp every time the function is used
 90  * @return {string} message optional message to display
 91  */
 92 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.timestamp	= function(message){
 93 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
 94 		console.log(''+ new Date + ': '+this._fnName+' being called');
 95 	}.bind(this));
 96 	return this;	// for chained API
 97 };
 98 
 99 /**
100  * log a message when the function is call
101  * @param  {string} message the message to display
102  */
103 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.log		= function(message){
104 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
105 		console.log(message);
106 	});
107 	return this;	// for chained API
108 };
109 
110 
111 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
112 //		support state							//
113 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
114 
115 /**
116  * mark the function as deprecated - aka you can use it but it will disapears soon
117  * @param  {string} message the optional message to provide
118  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
119  */
120 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.deprecated	= function(message){
121 	var used	= false;
122 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
123 		if( used )	return;
124 		used	= true;
125 		console.warn(message || "Deprecated function "+this._fnName+" called. Please update your code.");
126 	}.bind(this));
127 	return this;	// for chained API
128 }
129 
130 /**
131  * mark the function as obsolete
132  * @param  {string} message obsolete message to display
133  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
134  */
135 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.obsolete	= function(message){
136 	var used	= false;
137 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
138 		if( used )	return;
139 		used	= true;
140 		console.assert(false, message || "Obsoleted function "+this._fnName+" called. Please update your code.");
141 	}.bind(this));
142 	return this;	// for chained API
143 }
144 
145 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
146 //		General hooks								//
147 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
148 
149 /**
150  * hook a function be be caller before the actual function
151  * @param  {Function} beforeFn the function to call
152  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
153  */
154 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.before	= function(beforeFn){
155 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, beforeFn, null);
156 	return this;	// for chained API
157 };
158 
159 /**
160  * hook a function to be called after the actual function
161  * @param  {Function} afterFn the function to be called after
162  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
163  */
164 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.after	= function(afterFn){
165 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, null, afterFn);
166 	return this;	// for chained API
167 };
168 
169 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
170 //		Benchmarking							//
171 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
172 
173 /**
174  * Warp the function call in a console.time()
175  * 
176  * @param  {String} label the label to use for console.time(label)
177  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
178  */
179 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.time	= function(label){
180 	label	= label !== undefined ? label : this._fnName+".time()-"+Math.floor(Math.random()*9999).toString(36);
181 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
182 		console.time(label)
183 	}, function(){
184 		console.timeEnd(label)
185 	});
186 	return this;	// for chained API
187 };
188 
189 /**
190  * Warp the funciton call in console.profile()/.profileEnd()
191  * 
192  * @param  {String} label label to use for console.profile()
193  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
194  */
195 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.profile	= function(label){
196 	label	= label !== undefined ? label : this._fnName+".profile-"+Math.floor(Math.random()*9999).toString(36);
197 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
198 		console.profile(label)
199 	}, function(){
200 		console.profileEnd(label)
201 	});
202 	return this;	// for chained API
203 };
204 
205 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
206 //										//
207 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
208 
209 /**
210  * Trigger the debugger when the function is called
211  *
212  * @param {Function} originalFn the original function
213  * @param {Function} [conditionFn] this function should return true, when the breakpoint should be triggered. default to function(){ return true; }
214  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
215 */
216 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.breakpoint	= function(fn, conditionFn){
217 	conditionFn	= conditionFn	|| function(){ return true; };
218 	this._currentFn	= function(){
219 		var stopNow	= conditionFn();
220 		// if stopNow, trigger debugger
221 		if( stopNow === true )	debugger;
222 		// forward the call to the original function
223 		return this._currentFn.apply(this, arguments);
224 	}.bind(this);
225 	return this;
226 }
227 
228 /**
229  * check function type as in ```TypeCheck.fn``` from typecheck.js
230  * @param  {Array}    paramsTypes allowed types for the paramter. array with each item is the allowed types for this parameter.
231  * @param  {Array}    returnTypes allowed types for the return value
232  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
233  */
234 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.typeCheck	= function(paramsTypes, returnTypes){
235 	this._currentFn	= TypeCheck.fn(this._currentFn, paramsTypes, returnTypes);
236 	return this;
237 }
238 
239 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
240 //		.trackUsage()							//
241 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
242 
243 var Stacktrace	= Stacktrace	|| require('../src/stacktrace.js');
244 
245 // create the tracker for .trackUsage
246 FunctionAttr.usageTracker	= new Stacktrace.Tracker();
247 
248 /**
249  * track where this property is used (getter and setter)
250  * 
251  * @param {String|undefined} trackName	optional name for Stacktrace.Tracker. default to originId
252  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
253  */
254 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.trackUsage	= function(trackName){
255 	var tracker	= FunctionAttr.usageTracker;
256 	// handle polymorphism
257 	trackName	= trackName	|| 'FunctionAttr.trackUsage:'+Stacktrace.parse()[1].originId();
258 	// actually record the usage
259 	this._currentFn	= FunctionAttr.wrapCall(this._currentFn, function(){
260 		tracker.record(trackName, 1);
261 	});
262 	// for chained API
263 	return this;
264 }
265 
266 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
267 //		.private()							//
268 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
269 
270 var PrivateForJS	= PrivateForJS	|| require('../src/privateforjs.js');
271 
272 /**
273  * Mark this function as private
274  * @param  {Function} klass the constructor of the function
275  * @return {FunctionAttr.Builder} for chained API
276  */
277 FunctionAttr.Builder.prototype.private	= function(klass){
278 	// sanity check
279 	console.assert(klass !== undefined)
280 	// overload currenFn
281 	this._currentFn	= PrivateForJS.privateFunction(klass, this_currentFn);
282 	// for chained API
283 	return this;
284 }
